description: Demolition of existing four storey Victorian building with associated outbuildings and the erection of a new three storey building (2389m²GEA) fronting Lough Road for continued education purposes (as a Pupil Referral Unit) within use class D1 (non-residential institutions).  The development involves erection of a separate 4m high plant room (56m² GEA); new vehicle access off Westbourne Road for parking and servicing; landscaping, Multi-Use Games Area, cycle storage and associated boundary treatment.
site_name: Our Lady Of The Sacred Heart Primary School Annexe
decision_conditions: By reason of its design and appearance, the proposed development fails to provide a high standard development and as a result would not contribute or create an appropriate relationship with surrounding buildings in the local area, contrary to policies D1 and D4 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
